Articles.Content: okay, i'm no newbie to this game. but i've had nothing but issues since upgrading to 0.25. i cannot launch a craft. my craft require that i press "esc" and "resume flight" in order to launch. the spacebar is an effectively useless button. what am i missing? why won't spacebar launch a craft, separate stages, etc? i am really frustrated. i've been playing this game for a year and this new version has rendered my play impossible.
Please see the stickied thread in this section. We can't do much (if anything) without solid information. Typically, that means a log file.
